Colors

View Code

<ul class="sg-colors">
  <li>
    <div class="sg-swatch" style="background: #027EA4;"></div>
    <div class="sg-label">#027ea4</div>
    <div class="sg-label">$ben-franklin-blue</div>
  </li>
  <li>
    <div class="sg-swatch" style="background: #F2BA13;"></div>
    <div class="sg-label">#f2ba13</div>
    <div class="sg-label">$bell-yellow</div>
  </li>
  <li>
    <div class="sg-swatch" style="background: #ffffff;"></div>
    <div class="sg-label">#ffffff</div>
    <div class="sg-label">$white</div>
  </li>
  <li>
    <div class="sg-swatch" style="background: #f1f3f1;"></div>
    <div class="sg-label">#f1f3f1</div>
    <div class="sg-label">$ghost-gray</div>
  </li>
  <li>
    <div class="sg-swatch" style="background: #edf4f7;"></div>
    <div class="sg-label">#edf4f7</div>
    <div class="sg-label">$whitesmoke</div>
  </li>
  <li>
    <div class="sg-swatch" style="background: #dbe1e3;"></div>
    <div class="sg-label">#dbe1e3</div>
    <div class="sg-label">$geyser</div>
  </li>
  <li>
    <div class="sg-swatch" style="background: #9299A5;"></div>
    <div class="sg-label">#9299A5</div>
    <div class="sg-label">$manatee</div>
  </li>
  <li>
    <div class="sg-swatch" style="background: #353535;"></div>
    <div class="sg-label">#353535</div>
    <div class="sg-label">$mine-shaft</div>
  </li>
  <li>
    <div class="sg-swatch" style="background: #000000;"></div>
    <div class="sg-label">#000000</div>
    <div class="sg-label">$black</div>
  </li>
</ul>

Our main color palette.

  • #027ea4
    $ben-franklin-blue
  • #f2ba13
    $bell-yellow
  • #ffffff
    $white
  • #f1f3f1
    $ghost-gray
  • #edf4f7

    $black

Accessibility

View Code

<span class="accessible"> Opens in new window</span>

An off-viewport notice for links that open in a new window.

Opens in new window

Address

View Code

<div class="vcard">
  <div class="org">Department Name</div>
  <div class="adr">
    <div class="street-address">1234 Main Street</div>
    <span class="locality">Philadelphia</span>,
    <span class="postal-code">19107</span>,
    <abbr class="region" title="Pennsylvania">PA</abbr>
  </div>
  <div class="tel">888-123-4567</div>
</div>

Vcard markup

Department Name
1234 Main Street
Philadelphia, 19107, PA
888-123-4567

Blockquote

View Code

<blockquote>
  <p>A block quotation (also known as a long quotation or extract) is a quotation in a written document, that is set off from the main text as a paragraph, or block of text, and typically distinguished visually using indentation and a different typeface or smaller size quotation.</p>
</blockquote>

A block quotation (also known as a long quotation or extract) is a quotation in a written document, that is set off from the main text as a paragraph, or block of text, and typically distinguished visually using indentation and a different typeface or smaller size quotation.

Callout

View Code

<div class="callout">
<p>You may need the following information before you pay online: Federal Entity Identification Number (EIN) or your Social Security Number (SSN) or Philadelphia Tax Account number and Philadelphia Department of Revenue PIN (personal identification number).</p>
</div>

You can use any combination of headings, but they should be in order.

You may need the following information before you pay online: Federal Entity Identification Number (EIN) or your Social Security Number (SSN) or Philadelphia Tax Account number and Philadelphia Department of Revenue PIN (personal identification number).

Fonts

View Code

<p>Primary font: "Open Sans", "Arial", sans-serif;</p>
<p><em>Primary font italic: "Open Sans", "Arial", sans-serif;</em></p>
<p><strong>Primary font bold: "Open Sans", "Arial", sans-serif;</strong></p>
<h1> Secondary font: 'Montserrat', 'Tahoma', sans-serif;</h1>

Primary font: "Open Sans", "Arial", sans-serif;

Primary font italic: "Open Sans", "Arial", sans-serif;

Primary font bold: "Open Sans", "Arial", sans-serif;

Secondary font: 'Montserrat', 'Tahoma', sans-serif;

Horizontal Rule

View Code

<hr>

Intro Text

View Code

<p class="intro">The intro text may be a lead-in to the passage of text, or it may just be used to create a visual distinction between the rest of the passage of text.</p>

The intro text may be a lead-in to the passage of text, or it may just be used to create a visual distinction between the rest of the passage of text.

Paragraph

View Code

<p>A paragraph (from the Greek paragraphos, "to write beside" or "written beside") is a self-contained unit of a discourse in writing dealing with a particular point or idea. A paragraph consists of one or more sentences. Though not required by the syntax of any language, paragraphs are usually an expected part of formal writing, used to organize longer prose.</p>

A paragraph (from the Greek paragraphos, "to write beside" or "written beside") is a self-contained unit of a discourse in writing dealing with a particular point or idea. A paragraph consists of one or more sentences. Though not required by the syntax of any language, paragraphs are usually an expected part of formal writing, used to organize longer prose.

Small Text

View Code

<div class="small-text">Look how meta we are!</div>

Small, grayed out text.

Look how meta we are!

Time

View Code

<time datetime="2013-04-06T12:32+00:00">2 weeks ago</time>

2 weeks ago

Headings

View Code

<h1>The City of Philadelphia</h1>
<h2>The City of Philadelphia</h2>
<h3>The City of Philadelphia</h3>
<h4>The City of Philadelphia</h4>
<h5>The City of Philadelphia</h5>
<h6>The City of Philadelphia</h6>

The City of Philadelphia

The City of Philadelphia

The City of Philadelphia

The City of Philadelphia

The City of Philadelphia
The City of Philadelphia

Heading Classes

View Code

<h6 class="h1">The City of Philadelphia</h6>
<h1 class="h2">The City of Philadelphia</h1>
<h2 class="h3">The City of Philadelphia</h2>
<h3 class="h4">The City of Philadelphia</h3>
<h4 class="h5">The City of Philadelphia</h4>
<h5 class="h6">The City of Philadelphia</h5>

You can also use class names to style headings. This should only be used to keep markup consistent with content.

The City of Philadelphia

The City of Philadelphia

The City of Philadelphia

The City of Philadelphia

The City of Philadelphia

The City of Philadelphia

Definition List

View Code

<dl>
  <dt>The word</dt>
  <dd>The definition</dd>
</dl>

The word
The definition

Inline List

View Code

<ul class="inline-list">
  <li><a href="#">Link 1</a></li>
  <li><a href="#">Link 2</a></li>
  <li><a href="#">Link 3</a></li>
  <li><a href="#">Link 4</a></li>
  <li><a href="#">Link 5</a></li>
</ul>

  • Link 1
  • Link 2
  • Link 3
  • Link 4
  • Link 5

Unordered List (No Bullets)

View Code

<ul class="no-bullet">
  <li>List item with a much longer description or more content.</li>
  <li>List item</li>
  <li>List item
    <ul>
      <li>Nested List Item</li>
      <li>Nested List Item</li>
      <li>Nested List Item</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
  <li>List item</li>
  <li>List item</li>
  <li>List item</li>
</ul>

  • List item with a much longer description or more content.
  • List item
  • List item
    • Nested List Item
    • Nested List Item
    • Nested List Item
  • List item
  • List item
  • List item

Ordered List

View Code

<ol>
  <li><a href="#">Link 1</a></li>
  <li><a href="#">Link 2</a></li>
  <li><a href="#">Link 3</a></li>
  <li><a href="#">Link 4</a></li>
  <li><a href="#">Link 5</a></li>
</ol>

  1. Link 1
  2. Link 2
  3. Link 3
  4. Link 4
  5. Link 5

Text Filter

View Code

<div id="filter-list">
  <form>
    <input class="search" type="text" placeholder="Filter results...">
  </form>
  <ul class="list">
    <li>List item with a much longer description or more content.</li>
    <li>List item</li>
    <li>List item
      <ul>
        <li>Nested List Item</li>
        <li>Nested List Item</li>
        <li>Nested List Item</li>
      </ul>
    </li>
    <li>List item</li>
    <li>List item</li>
    <li>List item</li>

Checkboxes

View Code

<form action="#">
  <fieldset class="options">
    <legend>Checkbox <abbr title="Required">*</abbr></legend>
    <ul class="no-bullet">
      <li><label for="checkbox1"><input id="checkbox1" name="checkbox" type="checkbox" checked="checked"> Choice A</label></li>
      <li><label for="checkbox2"><input id="checkbox2" name="checkbox" type="checkbox"> Choice B</label></li>
      <li><label for="checkbox3"><input id="checkbox3" name="checkbox" type="checkbox"> Choice C</label></li>
    </ul>
  </fieldset>
</form>

Checkbox *

Error Text Field

View Code

<p>
  <label class="error">Danger, Will Robinson!</label>
  <input class="is-error" type="text" placeholder="Text Input">
</p>

Valid Input

View Code

<label  class="valid">Valid</label>
<input  class="is-valid" type="text" placeholder="Text Input">

Number Input

View Code

<p>
  <label for="number">Number Input <abbr title="Required">*</abbr></label>
  <input id="number" type="number" placeholder="Enter a Number" pattern="[0-9]*">
</p>

Password Input

View Code

<p>
  <label for="password">Password</label>
  <input id="password" type="password" placeholder="Type your Password">
</p>

Radio Buttons

View Code

<form action="#">
  <fieldset class="options">
    <legend>Radio</legend>
    <ul class="no-bullet">
      <li><label for="radio1"><input id="radio1" name="radio" type="radio" class="radio" checked="checked"> Option 1</label></li>
      <li><label for="radio2"><input id="radio2" name="radio" type="radio" class="radio"> Option 2</label></li>
      <li><label for="radio3"><input id="radio3" name="radio" type="radio" class="radio"> Option 3</label></li>
    </ul>
  </fieldset>
</form>

Radio

Select Menu

View Code

<label for="select">Select</label>
  <select id="select">
    <optgroup label="Option Group">
        <option>Option One</option>
        <option>Option Two</option>
        <option>Option Three</option>
    </optgroup>
</select>

Text Input

View Code

<p>
  <label for="text">Text Input <abbr title="Required">*</abbr></label>
  <input id="text" type="text" placeholder="Text Input">
</p>

Textarea

View Code

<p>
  <label for="textarea">Textarea</label>
  <textarea id="textarea" rows="8" cols="48" placeholder="Enter your message here"></textarea>
</p>

Web Address

View Code

<p>
  <label for="webaddress">Web Address</label>
  <input id="webaddress" type="url" placeholder="http://yoursite.com">
</p>

Search Form

View Code

<form class="search">
  <input type="text" placeholder="What are you looking for?"><input type="submit">
</form>

Trending Search Form

View Code

<form class="search hint">
  <input type="text" placeholder="I'm looking for...">
  <p>e.g.Property Information, Department of Revenue, Water Billing</p>
</form>

Generally, only for use on the homepage

e.g.Property Information, Department of Revenue, Water Billing

Button and Disabled Button

View Code

<a href="#" class="button">Button</a>
<a href="#" class="button alternate">Button Alternate</a>
<a href="#" class="button disabled">Disabled Button</a>

Button Button Alternate Disabled Button

Button with Description

View Code

<a href="#" class="button">Start Now</a>
<div class="small-text">On the ePay website</div>

Primarily for "Start Now" buttons on Service Pages

Start Now
On the ePay website

Button with Icon

View Code

<a href="#" class="button icon">Button with Icon<i class="fa fa-bell"></i></a>
<a href="#" class="button icon alternate">Button with Icon Alternate<i class="fa fa-beer"></i></a>

Button with Icon Button with Icon Alternate

Call to Action Button

View Code

<div class="row">
  <div class="call-to-action small-8 column">
    <a href="#" target="_blank" aria-label="Submit a Request to 311" role="button">
      <span class="fa-stack fa-3x">
        <i class="fa fa-circle fa-stack-2x"></i>
        <i class="fa fa-stack-1x fa-inverse"><span class="h6">311</span></i>
      </span>
      <h2 class="h3">Submit a Request</h2>
      <span class="accessible"> Opens in new window</span>

    </a>
  </div>
</div>

311

Submit a Request

Opens in new window

Breadcrumbs

View Code

<div class="row">
  <div id="breadcrumbs" class="large-24 columns">
    <ul class="inline-list">
      <li><a href="#">Home</a></li>
      <li><a href="#">Grandparent</a></li>
      <li><a href="#">Parent</a></li>
      <li>Child</li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</div>

  • Grandparent

Table

View Code

<table role="grid" summary="A description of the table should go here for screenreaders.">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th width="200">Table Header</th>
      <th>Table Header</th>
      <th width="150">Table Header</th>
      <th width="150">Table Header</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>Content Goes Here</td>
      <td>This is longer content Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus.</td>
      <td>Content Goes Here</td>
      <td>Content Goes Here</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>Content Goes Here</td>
      <td>This is longer Content Goes Here Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus.</td>
      <td>Content Goes Here</td>
      <td>Content Goes Here</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>Content Goes Here</td>
      <td>This is longer Content Goes Here Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus.</td>
      <td>Content Goes Here</td>
      <td>Content Goes Here</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

Accessible tables, ftw!

Table Header Table Header Table Header Table Header
Content Goes Here This is longer content Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus. Content Goes Here Content Goes Here
Content Goes Here This is longer Content Goes Here Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus. Content Goes Here Content Goes Here
Content Goes Here This is longer Content Goes Here Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus. Content Goes Here Content Goes Here

Site-Wide Alert

View Code

<div id="site-wide-alert">
  <div class="row">
    <div class="large-8 columns">
      <h2><i class="ionicons ion-alert-circled"></i>Winter Weather Advisory</h2>
        <div class="alert-start"><time datetime="2015-01-05T+06:00">01-05-2015 06:00pm</time> <strong>to</strong> <time datetime="2015-01-08T+02:00">01-08-2015 02:00</time>pm</div>
      </div>
        <div class="large-16 columns">
          <strong>Code Blue Effective: </strong>Severe cold weather is expected. If you see a homeless person on the street, please call the Project Home Outreach Hotline 215 232 1884. For all other winter-related inquiries, call 311.
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Usually a weather-related alert

Winter Weather Advisory

01-05-2015 06:00pm to 01-08-2015 02:00pm
Code Blue Effective: Severe cold weather is expected. If you see a homeless person on the street, please call the Project Home Outreach Hotline 215 232 1884. For all other winter-related inquiries, call 311.

Footer

View Code

<!-- Begin Footer -->
<footer class="site-footer" role="contentinfo">
  <div class="row">
  <div class="large-6 columns">
      <a href="#">City of Philadelphia</a>
    </div>
    <div class="large-6 columns feedback">
      <a href="#">Feedback</a>
    </div>
    <div class="large-12 columns">
      <nav>
        <ul class="inline-list">
          <li><a href="#">Link 1</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">Link 2</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">Link 3</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">Link 4</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">Link 5</a></li>
        </ul>
      </nav>

    </div>
  </div>
</footer>

<!-- End Footer -->

Standard Header

View Code

<!-- Begin .header -->
<header class="site-header" role="banner">
  <div class="row">
    <div class="small-24 medium-12 columns">
      <a href="#">
  <img src="/images/city-of-philadelphia-logo.png" class="logo no-scale" alt="City of Philadelphia">
</a>

    </div>
    <div class="small-24 medium-12 columns">
      <form class="search">
  <input type="text" placeholder="What are you looking for?"><input type="submit">
</form>

    </div>
  </div>
</header>
<!-- End .header -->

Media Block

View Code

<div class="row">
  <div class="medium-8">
    <div class="story s-box">
        <a href="#" target="_blank">
          <img src="/images/internships.jpg" alt="Apply to Philadelphia Internships">
      </a>
      <a href="#" target="_blank">
        <h3>Apply to the Mayor’s Internship Program</h3>
      </a>
        <div class="small-text">Experience Philadelphia</div>
      <p>Undergraduate and graduate students interested in City government or gaining valuable workplace experience should
        <a href="#" target="_blank">apply to the MIPs</a> before January 30th, 2015.
        </p>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Apply to the Mayor’s Internship Program
Experience Philadelphia

Undergraduate and graduate students interested in City government or gaining valuable workplace experience should apply to the MIPs before January 30th, 2015.

Panel

View Code

<div class="panel center"><p>Is this information correct? <a href="#">Let us know</a>.</p></div>

Is this information correct? Let us know.

Related Content Sidebar

View Code

<div id="secondary" class="related" role="complementary">
    <h3>Related Content</h3>
    <ul>
  <li>List item with a much longer description or more content.</li>
  <li>List item</li>
  <li>List item
    <ul>
      <li>Nested List Item</li>
      <li>Nested List Item</li>
      <li>Nested List Item</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
  <li>List item</li>
  <li>List item</li>
  <li>List item</li>
</ul>

</div>
